message:
Project: CONSTRUCTION OF CHIRAMBO PRIMARY SCHOOL CLASSROOM BLOCK
Sector: Education
Location: Northern Region, Rumphi
Status: None
Budget: MWK 99,833,510.00

source.sql:
SELECT PROJECTNAME, FISCALYEAR, REGION, DISTRICT,
                       TOTALBUDGET, PROJECTSTATUS, PROJECTSECTOR
                FROM proj_dashboard
                WHERE ISLATEST = 1
             AND (LOWER(REGION) LIKE LOWER('%rumphi%') OR LOWER(DISTRICT) LIKE LOWER('%rumphi%')) AND LOWER(PROJECTSECTOR) LIKE LOWER('%education%') ORDER BY PROJECTNAME ASC
